CSS preloaders

David Granjon

2019-03-01

Source: vignettes/css-preloader.Rmd
css-preloader.Rmd

How to set up a preloader

Pass the argument enable_preloader = TRUE to the dashboardPagePlus() function. You can also change the loading duration (2s by default): loading_duration = 5 for 5 seconds.


library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(shinydashboardPlus)

shinyApp(
  ui = dashboardPagePlus(
    enable_preloader = TRUE,
    header = dashboardHeaderPlus(
     enable_rightsidebar = TRUE,
     rightSidebarIcon = "gears"
    ),
    sidebar = dashboardSidebar(),
    body = dashboardBody(),
    rightsidebar = rightSidebar(),
    title = "DashboardPage"
  ),
  server = function(input, output) { }
)
